title: Aadhya Ruby Drop Earring with Polki Accents
features: A unique contemporary design featuring a geometric arrangement of a custom cut Ruby stone, adorned with glittering Polki Diamonds, this drop style earring embodies modern elegance. The Ruby showcases a beautiful carved pattern. The geometric shapes add a contemporary flair while maintaining a classic appeal.
occasions: or adding a touch of luxury to everyday wear. Ideal for modern brides who appreciate classic style.
description: This earring is a fusion of tradition and modernity. The Hyderabadi polish provides a rich luster, while the Polki diamonds add a touch of timeless elegance. The carefully selected Ruby with its exceptional red hue symbolizes love and prosperity, making it an heirloom piece for generations.
